line_1: Who mourn the past, nor hope the morrow.
line_2: It falls for those yet doomed to sorrow;

line_1: Which Hans must answer for to Morrow.
line_2: My Lady was disturb'd: new Sorrow!

line_1: Though, pleasure shine not in the expected morrow,
line_2: The light of Heaven could banish half my sorrow,

line_1: Such I, alas! may be to Morrow:
line_2: The Justice of thy Cloe's Sorrow.

line_1: And leave to Heaven the morrow;
